rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
在轻度认知障碍研究中石榴籽油可增强大脑功能研究表明，石榴籽油 (PSO) 与地中海饮食 (MeDi) 相结合可显着增强轻度认知障碍 (MCI) 个体的认知功能，表明 PSO 作为认知健康的潜在自然干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Pomegranate-seed-oil-boosts-brain-function-in-mild-cognitive-impairment-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Pomegranate-seed-oil-boosts-brain-function-in-mild-cognitive-impairment-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd12b760-642c-4323-8162-fb7d4a095b83 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 23:32:00 -0500 Pomegranate seed oil boosts brain function in mild cognitive impairment study
研究表明，白藜芦醇可以通过抑制炎症来对抗阿尔茨海默病研究表明，白藜芦醇能够通过抑制促炎反应和促进小胶质细胞系中抗氧化酶的表达来减轻阿尔茨海默病 (AD) 症状，从而深入了解其神经保护机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Resveratrol-can-combat-Alzheimers-via-itis-suppression-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Resveratrol-can-combat-Alzheimers-via-itis-suppression-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bdf75606-3ceb-4670-aaf3-fc7a9a822576 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 23:03:00 -0500 Resveratrol can combat Alzheimer's via inflammatory suppression, study shows
NIH 拨款 190 万美元用于研究复杂的微生物群落如何影响人类健康生活在人体内的细菌和微生物——；微生物群-；可能会影响人类健康、疾病风险，甚至身体吸收药物的方式，但这些过程的细节尚不清楚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/NIH-awards-2419-million-to-investigate-how-complex-communities-of-microbes-impact- human-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/NIH-awards-2419-million-to-investigate-how-complex-communities-of-microbes-impact- human-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f09f3c6d-a462-4026-9a8c-4b32fef5b6d5 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 22:57:12 -0500 NIH awards $1.9 million to investigate how complex communities of microbes impact human health
以初级保健为基础的住房计划在解决健康问题社会决定因素方面显示出希望布里格姆研究人员发现，参与住房计划与门诊就诊次数减少、身心健康改善以及与初级保健诊所和护理团队的联系更紧密有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Primary-care-based-housing-program-shows-promise-in-addressing-social-determinants-of-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Primary-care-based-housing-program-shows-promise-in-addressing-social-determinants-of-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=785243f2-9c25-47fb-ba09-7871d088aa57 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 22:53:09 -0500 Primary-care-based housing program shows promise in addressing social determinants of health
SARS-CoV-2 片段被发现模仿免疫系统肽，加剧炎症研究表明 SARS-CoV-2 片段模仿免疫肽，可能驱动病毒的炎症反应，为了解 COVID-19 的严重炎症机制提供了见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/SARS-CoV-2-fragments-found-to-mimic-immune-system-peptides-fueling-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/SARS-CoV-2-fragments-found-to-mimic-immune-system-peptides-fueling-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ddfbdc00-9b90-40a6-b6be-42dc662e8478 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 22:47:00 -0500 SARS-CoV-2 fragments found to mimic immune system peptides, fueling inflammation
密歇根州立大学的科学家们揭示了对抗胶质母细胞瘤的潜在游戏规则改变者密歇根州立大学的一个科学家团队公布了对抗胶质母细胞瘤的潜在游戏规则改变者，胶质母细胞瘤是最常见且目前无法治愈的脑癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/MSU-scientists-unveil-a-pottial-game-changer-in-the-fight-against-glioblastoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/MSU-scientists-unveil-a-pottial-game-changer-in-the-fight-against-glioblastoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab24633a-fac0-4450-91ac-0c2f8c21661c Mon, 05 Feb 2024 22:46:47 -0500 MSU scientists unveil a potential game-changer in the fight against glioblastoma
研究发现多普勒超声可检测小婴儿的胎盘问题多普勒超声测量未出生婴儿的血流量可以揭示胎盘是否正常工作。如果这些多普勒测量结果反复出现偏差，则需要对未出生的婴儿进行额外监测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Doppler-ultrasound-detects-placental-issues-in-small-babies-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Doppler-ultrasound-detects-placental-issues-in-small-babies-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d869071-7b39-47bc-ba07-01f3f11b44b7 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 22:41:41 -0500 Doppler ultrasound detects placental issues in small babies, study finds
长期新冠恢复见解：疲劳和认知缺陷在两年内得到改善研究表明，两年多以来，长期感染新冠病毒的患者的认知缺陷和疲劳有所改善，其中包括抑郁症状和预示无法康复的老年等特定危险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Long-COVID-recovery-insight-Fatigue-and-cognitive-deficits-improve-over-two-years.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Long-COVID-recovery-insight-Fatigue-and-cognitive-deficits-improve-over-two-years.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ade0c605-4d98-43ab-bccb-0b622758ee00 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 22:26:00 -0500 Long-COVID recovery insight: Fatigue and cognitive deficits improve over two years
大量使用大麻会增加患新焦虑症的风险最新研究表明，因吸食大麻而到急诊室就诊的人中有 27% 在三年内患上了新的焦虑症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Heavy-cannabis-use-linked-to-increased-risk-of-developmenting-a-new-anxiety-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Heavy-cannabis-use-linked-to-increased-risk-of-developmenting-a-new-anxiety-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa6450f2-8dcb-418a-aec5-266b60235867 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 21:57:59 -0500 Heavy cannabis use linked to increased risk of developing a new anxiety disorder
研究表明超加工食品与较高的代谢疾病风险有关食用超加工食品 (UPF) 与肥胖和 2 型糖尿病 (T2DM) 等代谢疾病的风险较高有关，这凸显了饮食谨慎和政策调整的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Study-links-ultra-processed-foods-to-higher-metabolic-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Study-links-ultra-processed-foods-to-higher-metabolic-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42d4f7c4-6f0c-4a2d-8425-d03741e82157 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 21:53:00 -0500 Study links ultra-processed foods to higher metabolic disease risk
